name: Jurassic Dino Clan Simulator
description:
Meet new clan simulator game - Jurassic Dinosaur Clan Simulator 3D.
All events unfold in the Jurassic period. Around the craters, exploding volcanoes and many diverse dangerous dinosaurs! This is a very dangerous island.

Choose a dinosaur and start creating your own clan. Explore the island. Beware of dangers. Collect dinosaurs like that in the clan. Your clan will protect you from the big dangerous dinosaurs. Therefore, the more dinosaurs entered the clan the better
Do not forget to get yourself food.

Start a survival with a clan of dinosaurs!
